# value

**Instance Property**

The value along the axis, in unit coordinates.

## Declaration

```swift
var value: Float { get }
```

## Getting the value

- **valueDidChangeHandler**: The block that the input object calls when the value changes.
- **lastValueTimestamp**: The time of the most recent value change.
- **lastValueLatency**: The time in seconds between the last value change and the current time.
